entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who whispers to Ron and Harry about their plan.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is tasked by Hermione to head off Umbridge.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is asked by Hermione to move people out of the corridor.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is also asked by Hermione to help move people out of the corridor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry and Hermione will get the cloak on and wait until it's safe.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is someone Ron needs to head off.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the one who has hurt Harry's scar.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is someone Voldemort may have dealt a fatal blow to.

relationships.description: Hermione tasks Ron with heading off Umbridge.
Hermione asks Ginny to move people out of the corridor.
Hermione also asks Luna to help move people out of the corridor.
Harry's scar is affected by Voldemort.
Voldemort may have dealt a fatal blow to Sirius.
